attr.title: Ri-li
attr.desc: A simple and fun arcade-style game in which you control a wooden toy train and collect wooden letters while avoiding obstacles.
attr.desc_md:
Ri-li is an open-source arcade-style game where players control a wooden toy train. The goal is to collect all the wooden letters of the alphabet while navigating through various tracks and avoiding obstacles.

The game features colorful graphics and is suitable for players of all ages.
